fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 Music fans get a discount if they book early for the Isle of Wight Festival. Book online before 24 January with Red Funnel (www.redfunnel.co.uk/music) and a camping package will cost £98pp for the whole weekend, 10-12 June, including foot passenger crossings and a pitch at a nearby campsite. Under £200 If you are still shaking off the festive excess then a hideaway cottage in Cornwall could be a good tonic. Cornish Traditional Cottages (01208 821666; www.corncott.com) offers 50 per cent off weeks beginning 22 and 29 January, now at £169 per week (approx £28pp). The price is for Kingsmill Farm Cottage in Botus Fleming sleeping six. Under £700 A culinary mushroom week is on offer in the Sierra Aracena, west of Seville, with Inntravel (01653 617910; < a href="http://www.inntravel.co.uk">www.inntravel.co.uk). On guided walks you will see wild mushrooms and then sample them for dinner. The price of £638pp includes flights from Heathrow, seven nights' self-catering and car hire. Departs 23 January. Under £1,100 Ride the 'Quetzal Highway,' with Tucan Travel (020 8896 1600; www.tucantravel.com) on this tour of Guatemala, Belize and Mexico. Included for £1,039pp are flights from Heathrow on 28 January and nine nights' accommodation. Under £1,300 Jetsave's (0870 162 3503; www.jetsave.co.uk) tour to Canada takes in snowscapes, cities and Niagara Falls from £1,299pp, including flights and 13 nights hotel/ rail accommodation. Book by 28 January for travel on 19 February.
